GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v4.14.283
GSD.description:
net: xfrm: unexport __init-annotated xfrm4_protocol_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit e53cd3814504b2cadaba4d5a8a07eeea9ddacd03, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit 2f32b51b609faea1e40bb8c5bd305f1351740936. For more details please see the references link.
